default._comment: 'default' is reserved for values that are not specified, it should be ignored when selected as a personality. Also, make sure EVERYTHING is put here when developing, as it cannot have any missing values.

global.final_upload_too_big: :floppy_disk: I can't upload my response because it's too big, please try again with a smaller file.
global.input_file_too_big: :floppy_disk: I can't upload my response because it's too big, please try again with a smaller file.
global.nsfw_no_search_result: :mag: I couldn't find anything matching your query.
global.no_search_result: :mag: I couldn't find anything matching your query.
global.command_timeout: :alarm_clock: Your command timed out, please try again.
global.check_failure: :fire: Something went wrong while verifying your commands requirements.
global.no_image_perm: :x: I don't have the permission to upload images in this channel. I may not be permitted to attach files and send messages.
global.no_nsfw: :underage: This command is NSFW only, please use it in a NSFW channel.
global.no_admin: :no_entry: You need admin privileges to use this command.
global.no_role: :no_entry: You need a specific role or privelage to use this command.
global.no_mod: :no_entry: You need moderator privileges to use this command.
global.no_server_owner: :no_entry: You need to be the server owner to use this command.
global.no_bot_owner: :no_entry: You need to be the bot owner to use this command (if you are the bot owner, please check and see that 'bot_owner' is set properly).
global.file_limit: :package: You have hit this command's file limit, please use less than {0} files.
global.image_command: :frame_photo: This command is for images, not gifs.
global.gif_command: :basketball_player: This command is for gifs, not images.
global.image_error: :warning: I was unable to download and/or verify one of your files.
global.download_fail: :warning: I was unable to download your image.
global.cooldown: :watch: This command needs some time before being used again.

prefix.current_prefix: :gear: My command prefix for this server is `{0}`.
prefix.set_prefix: :white_check_mark: I've set my command prefix for this server to `{0}`.
prefix.input_too_big: :no_entry_sign: Please enter a prefix shorter than {0}.

personality.current_personality: :gear: I'm currently running on the `{0}` personality.
personality.invalid_personality: :no_entry_sign: You entered an invalid personality, the valid personality options are `{0}`

random-number.min-greater: :warning: Your minimum is greater than your maximum

crypto.invalid-codes: :warning: Something went wrong, make sure that you are using valid 3 character currency codes

roll.high_count: :x: Please enter a number of dice smaller than {0}
roll.high_sides: :x: Please enter a side count smaller than {0}

warnhistory.sent: {0.mention} I've sent you a copy of the warnings for **{1.name}#{1.discriminator}**.
warnhistory.clean_full: :smiley: User **{0.name}#{0.discriminator}** has no warnings on record!
warnhistory.clean_partial: :neutral_face: User **{0.name}#{0.discriminator}** has no warnings for server **{1.name}** (`{1.id}`), but has some on other servers.
warnhistory.clean_partial_notice: :exclamation: This user has warnings on other servers.

delwarning.error: :warning: The ID you entered doesn't exist or there was an error deleting the specified record.

getwarning.error: :warning: The ID you entered doesn't exist or there was a problem retrieving the specified warning.
getwarning.sent: {0.mention} I've sent you a copy of the warning `{1}`

global.command_wait: Fuck off while I do shit
